OneLineDescription: A dynamically generated mod to rework how the one and two handed weapon skills and their respective perks work.
LongDescription:
A dynamically generated mod to rework how the one and two handed weapon skills and their respective perks and related spell and magic effects work.

REQUIRES SPELL PERK ITEM DISTRIBUTOR AND ITS OWN MOD COUNTERPART FOUND HERE:
https://github.com/ReaperAnon/WeaponSkillOverhaul/releases

A few settings presets are also available for download.

By default meant to recreate a more Oblivion-like skill distribution with swords and hafted weapons each replacing the vanilla one handed and two handed perk tree.

The perks within are automatically made compatible, be they base game perks or from mods.
Detailed instructions on how to use the options or create new setups can be found in the description on the GitHub page:
https://github.com/ReaperAnon/WeaponSkillOverhaul
